About

Ayan De (he/him/De) is a recent graduate in Aerospace Engineering currently based in Mumbai, IN. He can often be found with a camera, wandering along city streets and hiking trails, or on the couch, engrossed in books and movies. Occasionally, he opens up a text editor.

His work is usually speculative in nature, and is often about men who could have used a lesson in dealing with their emotions earlier in their lives. Maybe that says something about him, but he is not self-aware enough to know what.

He is burdened with unfinished drafts of many short stories and screenplays, but that's only because when he sees a shiny new idea, he just has to go towards it. Do not pity him.

One day, he hopes to finally be good enough to write the idea his 10-year-old self had.
